item.title: Instalar Spotify en Ubuntu 16.04
item.description:
Si queremos instalar el cliente de Spotify en Ubuntu Xenial Xerus, tan sólo tenemos que instalar la clave:

bash $ sudo apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv-keys BBEBDCB318AD50EC6865090613B00F1FD2C19886 Executing: /tmp/tmp.imoQkQ9ZVV/gpg.1.sh --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv-keys BBEBDCB318AD50EC6865090613B00F1FD2C19886 gpg: solicitando clave D2C19886 de …
item.dc:creator: Nacho Cano
